function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate indoor air quality leading to the spread of airborne viruses and diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and illness among building occupants","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of HVAC systems, implementation of smart ventilation control and better humidity control","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, air purifiers, HVAC sensors","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, building professionals","Owner":"Facility managers, building professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for human-building interactions and spatial organization","Impact":"Higher risk of close human-human encounters and potential spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Redesigning building layouts to promote social distancing, implementing touchless technologies, and reducing shared spaces","Technologies":"Digital occupancy sensors, touchless entry systems, spatial planning software","People":"Building professionals, architects, facility managers","Owner":"Building professionals, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate focus on healthy building principles in design and construction","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of buildings to future epidemics and health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Integration of healthy building principles in design standards, education and training of building professionals on health-centric design","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM), data analytics for health monitoring, software for health-centric design","People":"Building professionals, construction industry stakeholders, researchers","Owner":"Building professionals, industry associations"}]}
